ygData.subject: Re: Jade Reavers
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes it does.  I like CoM for just hunting, but the reaver hunts suck.  My guild has a ton of druids and rangers...and all of us need one. Estro Runeweaver 53
ygData.messageBody:
Yes it does. I like CoM for just hunting, but the
reaver hunts suck. My guild has a ton of druids and
rangers...and all of us need one.

Estro Runeweaver
53 season druid of the Crimson Stalkers
Kane Bayle
No Epic

Message: 1
> Date: Sun, 4 Jan 2004 14:59:24 -0500
> From: "Wulfric Rennison"
> <rgillispie@...>
> Subject: Jade Reavers
>
> Just to let everyone know...
>
> hunting black reavers in City of Mist SUCKS!!!!
>
> tough zone to move around in. Lots of undead that
> see invis and a 2 hour spawn rate on the reavers.
> Not to mention secret passages and crazy aggros....
>
>
> What a crock of shite I tell ya! And only one jade
> reaver to show for it. With 3 in group that need
> them.
>
> Raido
> 52 dru
> Cazic Thule server
>
> [This message contained attachments]
>
